history.proof: intros x. unfold Weak. sfirstorder depth: 3use: T, comp, S_star, star_refl, star, L.

original: intros x. unfold Weak. destruct x. - apply star_refl. - apply S_star with (y:=L a) (z:=T). apply comp with (y:=star (Red T)). apply star_refl. apply comp with (y:=Red (L a)). apply star_refl. apply star_refl.
